data.name: Mad Machines: Season ZERO Pass
data.detailed_description:
The Season ZERO Pass offers new and unique content to unlock. These items are only available to unlock during Season ZERO.

Season ZERO will begin on May 2nd, 2019 and will last for 90 days.

SEASON ZERO PASS DLC includes:
- 3 new characters including each 5 Tiers
- 3 new weapons including each 5 Tiers
- 3 new special weapons
- special badge
- special banner
- access to Tournament ladder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
